name: Stop Messing Around!
effect: Your attacking character gets +5 to all stats this battle and does not deal power damage. Play only during battle.

name: Streets of Karakura
effect: When a Hollow in your party defeats a Human, your opponent discards a random card from his hand and draws a card.

name: Subdue by Force
effect: (Remove from the game after use.) You may use STR as your defending stat this battle. Play only when your opponent attacks.

name: Swift Justice
effect: (Remove from the game after use.) You may use your QCK as your defending stat this battle. Play only when your opponent attacks.

name: Take Aim
effect: Name a trait. While a character in your party is attacking a character with that trait, your character gets +1 to all stats for that battle.

name: Tatsuki - Eager to Spar
effect:
Cute, Female, Good, Human, Student

Tatsuki gets +1 to all stats while all characters in your party are Students.

name: Tatsuki - Enraged Protector
effect:
Cute, Female, Good, Human, Student

1 Body: Renew Tatsuki. Use only when your Orihime loses a battle. Limit once per turn.

name: Tatsuki - Feeling The Burn
effect:
Cute, Female, Good, Human, Student

When Tatsuki wins a battle, your opponent loses power equal to the losing character's energy cost.

name: Tatsuki - on the Rampage
effect: Cute, Female, Good, Human, Student

name: Taurus Hollow - Ready To Go
effect:
Evil, Hollow, Non-Unique

2 Body, deplete: Choose a character in your opponent's party. That character cannot defend against your Hollows that cost 1 energy or less this turn.

name: Tessai - Diligent Worker
effect:
Good, Human, Male

When Tessai enters play, search your deck for an item and put it in your hand.

name: Tessai - Hollow Destroyer
effect:
Good, Human, Male

Deplete: Choose an item attached to a character in your party and attach it to another character in your party.

name: The Mr. Kan'onji Challenge
effect: (Remove from the game after use.) Draw 2 cards. (*) If you play 6 or more cards from your hand after The Mr. Kan'onji Challenge this Step, renew all your energy at the end of this Step. Play only during the Main Step. (*) (Limit 2 copies per deck.)

name: The Perfect Plan
effect: (Remove from the game after use.) If your party has 3 or more Cute characters, your opponent can only attack 1 time this turn.

name: Toast
effect: Attached Human gets +1 FOR.

name: Tragic Accident
effect: Discard a character from your hand: Search your deck for a character that has one of the same traits as the character you discarded and put it in your hand.

name: Tribal Hollow - Freshly Summoned
effect: Evil, Hollow, Non-Unique

name: Tsubaki - Shunshunrikka Member
effect:
Cute, Good, Male, Spirit

Deplete, remove Tsubaki from the game: Remove one your opponent's characters from the game. Use only during the End Step.

name: Underground Training Facility
effect: 1 Spirit, 1 Body, 1 Mind: Put an energy in play depleted. Use only at the start of your turn while you have less energy than your opponent.

name: Unjust Actions
effect: Remove a defeated character from the game instead of discarding it. Use while your party has only Hollows.

name: Unlocked Potential
effect: (Remove from the game after use.) Renew a character in your party. That character cannot deal power damage this turn.

name: Up Close and Personal
effect: Your character gets +4 STR this battle. Play only during battle.

name: Urahara's Shop
effect: (Urahara's Shop costs 1 spirit energy while you have Kisuke in your party.) Remove Urahara's Shop from the game: Deplete an opponent's character that has an energy cost less than the number of items you control.

name: Ururu - Heavy Arms Specialist
effect:
Cute, Female, Good, Human

2 Body, deplete: Discard any character in play that has an energy cost equal to or less than the number of items you control.

name: Ururu - Sparring Partner
effect:
Cute, Female, Good, Human

Deplete, discard Ururu from play: Renew 1 mind, 1 body, and 1 spirit energy. Use only when you play an item while Kisuke is in your party.

name: Uryu - Bandaged Duelist
effect:
Cute, Good, Human, Male, Quincy, Student

Deplete, remove Uryu from the game: Your opponent loses 6 power. Use only while you have 3 or more other Cute Humans in your party.

Cute, Good, Human, Male, Quincy, Student

name: Uryu - Scared Apprentice

Good, Human, Male, Quincy, Student

name: Uryu - Unrelenting

Cute, Good, Human, Male, Quincy

effect:

name: Uryu Ishida
effect:
Guardian's Power: 38

Once per game, you may shuffle your hand into your deck and draw the same number of cards.

name: Vase of Flowers
effect: Attach only to a Whole. Attached character gets +2 to all stats while defending.

name: Vicious Strike
effect: Look at your opponent's hand and discard a card from it. Use only when you defeat one of his characters.

name: Watching From Afar
effect: (Remove from the game after use.) Search your discard pile for 4 cards and put them at the bottom of your deck.

name: Yasutora "Chad" Sado

effect:

Animal, Cute

effect:
Female, Male, Whole

name: Yuichi - Resolved Youth
effect:
Cute, Male, Whole

Animal, Cute

effect:
Cute, Female, Good, Human

effect:

name: Yuzu - Skilled Cook
effect:
Cute, Female, Good, Human

name: Zabimaru
effect: Attached character gets +1 to all stats. If that character is Renji, your opponent cannot boost SPP while that Renji is attacking.

name: Zangetsu
